channel.title: Comments on: Top Irish Web Apps on readwriteweb

item.title: By: Derek Organ
item.dc:creator: Derek Organ
item.description:
good to see a bit of coverage for the irish apps on such a big site. Hopefully the next time someone is doing this they will think of our app. We are looking to get some publicity next month after a successful new version release to our existing customers.
http://1timetracking.com/
item.content:encoded:
good to see a bit of coverage for the irish apps on such a big site. Hopefully the next time someone is doing this they will think of our app. We are looking to get some publicity next month after a successful new version release to our existing customers.

http://1timetracking.com/

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: Would have been even better had it covered all the Irish companies in this space...
item.content:encoded: Would have been even better had it covered all the Irish companies in this space…
